narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
This 1st prelicense inspection for a Class C license and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare
Act.
Applicant must submit license fees to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave Building B Mailstop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
